name: Goat (noiseminded)
description:
In the far northwest of Portugal, mountain goats are hunted and decapitated. Poachers take the heads of this protected species and sell them as trophies for thousands of Euros, leaving their headless carcasses behind. This is the story of one of those hunters.

Created in 48 hours for MAD Game Jam 2022. Won 1st Prize.
